extension.name: Moolah E-Commerce Package
extension.author: Toby Patterson
extension.description:
Moolah E-Commerce Store

Moolah provides a single-page, mobile-ready checkout for your website without needing to install any software.

Key Features:

  • Your store will load into the current page of your site, and each step of the check loads smoothly into the current page.
  • A Moolah store can adjust automatically to whatever device the customer is using, and works with as well with a 4" screen as it does with a 24" screen.
  • You can easily integrate Moolah into any website, including Joomla, Wordpress, or even a normal HTML webpage.
  • A store can be deployed to several sites at the same time, and managed from one central location.
